Title: Defines humanitarian emergency response and relief centers
Summary: Defines humanitarian emergency response and relief centers as shelters that provide assistance to arriving asylees or that provide shared sleeping and bathroom facilities for more than 96 hours and includes such centers within the definition of homeless project.
LawCode: Amd ยง42, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to defining humanitarian emergency response and relief centers
